verses.name: 2 Kings 18:32
verses.text: Until I come and take you away to a land like your own land, a land of corn and wine, a land of bread and vineyards, a land of oil olive and of honey, that ye may live, and not die: and hearken not unto Hezekiah, when he persuadeth you, saying, The Lord will deliver us.

verses.name: 2 Kings 18:33
verses.text: Hath any of the gods of the nations delivered at all his land out of the hand of the king of Assyria?
